words.definition: Absence is the state of something being not there.
words.example: The GS absence of rain caused the plants to die.

words.definition: If you say something aloud, you say it so that others can hear you.
words.example: The GS the teacher read the story aloud.

words.definition: If someone is bald, they have no hair on their head.
words.example: The GS he became bald as he got older.

words.definition: A blanket is a piece of cloth that you use to keep warm while you sleep.
words.example: The GS she put a blanket on the bed.

words.definition: To creep is to move quietly and slowly.
words.example: The GS the cat crept toward the mouse.

words.definition: A divorce is the legal ending of a marriage.
words.example: The GS his parents got a divorce.

words.definition: To imitate someone is to do exactly what they do.
words.example: The GS the boy imitated his father.

words.definition: An infant is a baby.
words.example: The GS the infant was crying.

words.definition: To kidnap someone is to take them away by force.
words.example: The GS the men tried to kidnap the child.

words.definition: A nap is a short sleep, usually during the day.
words.example: The GS he took a nap after lunch.

words.definition: Nowhere means no place or not anywhere.
words.example: The GS I looked for my keys, but they were nowhere.

words.definition: To pat something is to hit it softly with your hand.
words.example: The GS she patted the dog on the head.

words.definition: Relief is a feeling you get when something bad or painful ends.
words.example: The GS it was a relief to hear that he was safe.

words.definition: To reproduce is to make a copy of something or to have a baby.
words.example: The GS some animals reproduce very quickly.

words.definition: To rhyme is to have the same sound at the end of a word.
words.example: The GS cat and hat rhyme.

words.definition: To suck is to put something in your mouth and use your tongue and lips to pull on it.
words.example: The GS the baby was sucking on his thumb.

words.definition: If something is urgent, it is very important and needs to be done right away.
words.example: The GS he had an urgent message for the doctor.

words.definition: To vanish is to disappear suddenly.
words.example: The GS the bird vanished into the trees.

words.definition: A wagon is a cart used to carry heavy things.
words.example: The GS he used a wagon to carry the wood.

words.definition: A wrinkle is a line on a person's face that happens as they get old.
words.example: The GS she had wrinkles around her eyes.
